contextId.information: These do not refer to a specific person. It means these types of people in general. AT: "your sons, your daughters, your male servants, your females servants, any Levite" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_genericnoun]])
contextId.quote: your son, your daughter, your male servant, your female servant, the Levite

contextId.information: This refers to these types of people in general. AT: "all foreigners, orphans, and widows" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_genericnoun]])
contextId.quote: the foreigner, the fatherless, and the widow

contextId.information: These refer to groups of people. AT: "for foreigners, for those who are fatherless, or for the widows" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_genericnoun]])
contextId.quote: for the foreigner, for the fatherless, or for the widow
